document.docAuthor: Klütsch, Cornelya F. C., Misof, Bernhard, Nasher, Abdul K. & Naumann, Clas Michael
document.docOrigin: Beiträge Zur Entomologie = Contributions to Entomology 55 (2)
document.masterDocTitle: Extended distribution patterns of the Arabian burnet moth Reissita simonyi (R, 1899) (Lepidoptera: Zygaenidae) and the Arabian wall brown Lasiommata felix (W, 1929) (Lepidoptera: Nymphalidae: Satyrinae) in Southern Arabia
